nodes.title: Unveiling the TikTok Trends of 2024: From GRWM to AI Innovations
nodes.description: As 2024 wraps up, don't miss these top TikTok trends! Discover how to boost your engagement with the latest viral content.
nodes.coverAlt: Unveiling the TikTok Trends of 2024: From GRWM to AI Innovations

nodes.title: The Rise of AI-Generated Music: Viral Hits and the Ongoing Debate
nodes.description: AI-generated music is capturing people's attention, creating a sensation and sparking debate over its impact on the music industry.
nodes.coverAlt: The Rise of AI-Generated Music: Viral Hits and the Ongoing Debate

nodes.title: Our Journey with SBIR Phase 1: Enhancing Healthcare Accessibility for CALD Communities
nodes.description: VideoTranslatorAI's journey for the NSW Small Business Innovation & Research (SBIR) program for the feasibility study began!
nodes.coverAlt: Our Journey with SBIR Phase 1: Enhancing Healthcare Accessibility for CALD Communities

nodes.title: Our Trusted Lingo Poster Was Accepted At AFAC '23!
nodes.description: Our poster on Project Trusted Lingo was accepted at the AFAC Conference. Learn more about our work and say hello to Mel Taylor at the event!
nodes.coverAlt: Our Trusted Lingo Poster Was Accepted At AFAC '23!

nodes.title: VideoTranslatorAI and Global Humanistic University Collaborate to Revolutionize AI Education
nodes.description: Global Humanistic University and VideoTranslatorAI are partnering on AI education. Explore the objectives and delivery plan on this exciting partnership.
nodes.coverAlt: VideoTranslatorAI and Global Humanistic University Collaborate to Revolutionize AI Education

nodes.title: Exploring the Future of Translation At UON: AI And Its Transformative Impact
nodes.description: Discover the transformative power of AI in translation! Our CEO was invited to a guest lecture at the University of Newcastle!
nodes.coverAlt: Exploring the Future of Translation At UON: AI And Its Transformative Impact

nodes.title: Embracing Resilience: Our Journey with the Bushfire Commercialisation Fund
nodes.description: Our journey with the Bushfire Commercialisation Fund, the power of positive feedback, and our next steps. #bushfiremitigation #resilience
nodes.coverAlt: Embracing Resilience: Our Journey With the Forest Fire Commercialization Fund

nodes.title: Trusted Lingo – A New Approach To CALD Communications
nodes.description: This blog post discusses a solution called "Trusted Lingo," an AI-based system that translates emergency broadcasts into over 20 languages in real-time.
nodes.coverAlt: Lingo Tepercaya – Pendekatan Baru Untuk Komunikasi CALD

nodes.title: How VideoTranslatorAI Helps Multicultural Communities In Emergencies
nodes.description: VideoTranslatorAI helps multicultural communities by translating audio, video, and text emergency broadcasts into 120+ languages.
nodes.coverAlt: How VideoTranslatorAI Helps Multicultural Communities In Emergencies

nodes.title: Is Your AI Talking Back?
nodes.description: Has Google invented a sentient AI? What does it mean and how does it work?
nodes.coverAlt: Is Your AI Talking Back, A Conversation With The CIO Show

nodes.title: How To Get To Pre-Product Market Fit For Startups
nodes.description: Learn more about how AI can help you get to product market fit.
nodes.coverAlt: How To Get To Pre-Product Market Fit For Startups

nodes.title: How To Use An AI Assurance Framework
nodes.description: What is an AI assurance framework and how to apply it to your projects.
nodes.coverAlt: How To Use An AI Assurance Framework

nodes.title: Latest News In The Translation Technology Industry
nodes.description: We have summarised news from the translation technology industry that covers the latest advancements in methods to preserve a dying language and break language barriers.
nodes.coverAlt: Latest News In The Translation Technology Industry

nodes.title: 10 Tips That Actually Work If You Want To Learn A New Language
nodes.description: Are you struggling to learn a new language? We have wrapped up 10 tips on how to learn a new language! Find out more in this article
nodes.coverAlt: 10 Tips That Actually Work If You Want To Learn A New Language

nodes.title: The Importance Of Learning A Foreign Language
nodes.description: Ever wondered why learning a foreign language is so important? Find out here as we discuss the 3 main importances of learning a foreign language
nodes.coverAlt: The Importance Of Learning A Foreign Language

nodes.title: Why You Should Use AI Powered Translator?
nodes.description: Artificial intelligence is changing the way we live. Find out 3 reasons how ai-powered translators can make your life easier.
nodes.coverAlt: Why You Should Use AI-Powered Translator

nodes.title: What Is The Best Subtitling Software Available?
nodes.description:
As a content creator and/or influencer engagement is top of mind. Using
  captions is a clear opportunity to increase engagement. What is the best subtitling
  and/or captioning software out there? Should you use a single tool to create the
  subtitles and a different one to merge them in?
nodes.coverAlt: What Is The Best Subtitling Software Available?

nodes.title: How Safe Is AI Transcription: What You Need To Know
nodes.description:
You are a content creator who uses AI. But how safe is the AI you use,
  whether for transcription, translation or dubbing. Also some tips on how to use
  AI better in your journey into expanding your market.
nodes.coverAlt: Translate Your English Video Into Filipino And Chinese

nodes.title: Translate Your English Video Into Filipino And Chinese
nodes.description:
You make videos in English - how can you translate these videos into
  Filipino and Chinese? We'll show you how to translate video and also how to deploy
  making sure you have amazing search engine optimisation (SEO).
nodes.coverAlt: Translate Your English Video Into Filipino And Chinese

nodes.title: How To Translate YouTube Videos And Dominate SEO
nodes.description:
How to translate a YouTube video? If you are a content creator on YouTube,
  you want to translate your video into different languages. This makes your audience
  bigger, and you get SEO benefits. This blog post shows you how to translate your
  YouTube videos, and deliver them to other social channels too.
nodes.coverAlt: How To Translate YouTube Videos And Dominate SEO

nodes.title: Clipping Chinese App: How To Translate Video Into Mandarin Chinese With AI
nodes.description:
How to translate your video content into Mandarin Chinese? Also known
  as clipping a video into Chinese, or a Chinese video maker, and how to deploy this
  content for amazing search engine optimisation (SEO).
nodes.coverAlt: Clipping Chinese App: How To Translate Video Into Mandarin Chinese With AI

nodes.title: Fighting the Coronavirus and E. Coli with Machine Learning
nodes.description:
When it comes to combating superbugs and viruses, the human raced needs
  all the help it can get. Artificial Intelligence is being implemented to find treatments
  to fight bacteria that was formally resistant to all forms of antibiotics.
nodes.coverAlt: Artificial Intelligence Saving the Humans

nodes.title: AI & Wildlife Preservation
nodes.description:
If there's one thing most of us can agree on, it's that wildlife preservation
  is important. Using Artificial Intelligence, researchers are fighting the good fight
  against wildlife population decline. And in a surprising twist, AI might just help
  us win this fight.
nodes.coverAlt: Artificial Intelligence Saving the Animals

nodes.title: Bleeding Edge AI: How A DeepMind Just Beat Team Liquid At StarCraft II
nodes.description:
If you didn't catch it, DeepMind's new AI, Alphastar, beat Team Liquid
  player, Grzegorz Komincz in a professional game of StartCraft II.
nodes.coverAlt: Bleeding Edge AI: How A DeepMind Just Beat Team Liquid At StarCraft II
